text: Walk to the nearest body of water. Sit for 5 minutes and just listen.
Text someone you haven't talked to in 3+ months. Just say hi and ask how they're doing.
Order something you've never tried at a restaurant you've never been to.
Take 10 photos of interesting shadows in your neighborhood.
Learn 5 phrases in a language you don't speak. Use them in a sentence.
Write a letter to your future self, 1 year from now. Seal it and put it somewhere safe.
Find a bench with a view. People watch for 15 minutes without your phone.
Cook a dish from a country you've never visited. Look up the recipe and go shopping for ingredients.
Give 3 genuine compliments to strangers today. Make them specific.
Go somewhere within 10 miles you've never been. Explore for 1 hour with no agenda.
Draw something without lifting your pen from the paper. Keep going for 5 minutes.
Listen to an entire album from start to finish. Do nothing else while it plays.
Call a family member you don't talk to enough. Have a real conversation.
Spend 20 minutes stretching or doing yoga. Focus only on your breathing.
Write down 10 things you're grateful for. Be specificâ€”no generic answers.
Watch a documentary about something you know nothing about.
Go to a bookstore or library. Pick a book at random and read the first chapter.
Take a different route home today. Notice 3 new things along the way.
Write a short story in exactly 50 words. No more, no less.
Buy a coffee for the person behind you in line. Or just give $5 to a stranger.
Spend 30 minutes learning the basics of a skill you've always wanted to try.
Go for a walk at sunrise or sunset. Take 5 photos of the changing light.
Host a dinner party for 4-6 friends. Cook everything from scratch.
Try a meditation app for the first time. Do a 10-minute session.
Make a playlist of 10 songs that represent your life right now.
Write a thank you note to someone who helped you years ago. Mail it.
Visit a museum or gallery you've never been to. Spend at least an hour there.
Go stargazing. Find 3 constellations you can identify.
Spend an hour in nature without any technology. Just observe.
Learn the choreography to a music video. Perform it in your living room.
Make a meal using only ingredients you already have. Get creative.
Attend a meetup or event for a hobby you're curious about.
Take a cold shower. Stay in for at least 30 seconds.
Research your family history. Find one interesting story from 3 generations back.
Go to a park and swing on the swings. Stay for at least 5 minutes.
Write a poem about your day. It doesn't have to rhyme.
Have a conversation with a stranger. Learn one thing about them.
Try a new form of exercise you've never done before.
Watch a movie in a language you don't speak. No subtitles allowed.
Go to a restaurant alone. Sit at the bar and order something adventurous.
Create something with your hands: origami, clay, knitting, anything.
Delete 3 apps from your phone that you don't need.
Plan a surprise for someone you care about. Execute it today.
Read 20 pages of a book you've been meaning to start.
Go for a bike ride to somewhere you've never been.
Journal for 15 minutes without stopping. Write whatever comes to mind.
Learn to solve a Rubik's cube. Spend an hour on it.
Make a collage from old magazines or printed photos.
Volunteer for 2 hours at a local organization.
Wake up 30 minutes earlier than usual. Use that time for yourself.
Learn to juggle. Practice for 20 minutes.
Go to a thrift store and buy something weird or interesting.
Spend an afternoon at a botanical garden or arboretum.
Write a letter to your younger self. What do you wish they knew?
Try to make someone laugh today. Use your best material.
Take a nap in a hammock or on grass under a tree.
Visit a place of worship different from your own or one you've never been to.
Do something that scares you just a little bit today.
Cook breakfast for dinner. Pancakes at 8 PM.
Build a blanket fort. Read a book inside it.
